justification: "To measure utilitarianism/deontology, we used the Process Dissociation procedure with 16 of the 20 original scenarios from Conway & Gawronski (2013)."

"We also implemented the traditional trolley dilemmas in their indirect (pulling a lever) and direct versions... we aimed to approximate deontological inclination with a question about the permissibility of inaction, and utilitarian inclination with a question about the permissibility of action."
"We also measured two other variables unrelated to this research: risk-taking (using a self-created set of lotteries)"
"...and disgust sensitivity (using a self-created Sounds of Disgust Scale, Disgust Scale-Revised, Olatunji et al., 2007, and Three Domains of Disgust Scale, Tybur et al., 2009)"
same sentence as above cites Disgust Scale-Revised for measuring disgust sensitivity.
same sentence lists Three Domains of Disgust Scale as another tool for disgust sensitivity.
